Class AppointmentCtrl

java.lang.Object
controller.AppointmentCtrl
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
EditAppointment, NewAppointment
public abstract class AppointmentCtrl extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
This class controls the Appointment View

    • validateAppointment

      protected boolean validateAppointment()
      This method checks to see if all fields are valid.

      Lambda 1: Returns true if appointments customers id matches the selected customer's id, adding it to the filtered list
      Lambda 2: Returns true if the appointment conflicts with any other appointment with the same customer.
      Returns:
      Returns true if all fields are valid, and false if not.
